resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106147</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106147</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087267</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">National Science Digital Library</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nationale Wissenschaft Digital Bibliothek</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bibliothèque Nationale de Digital de la Science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biblioteca Nacional De Digital Da Ciência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Libreria Nazionale Di Digital Di Scienza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εθνική ψηφιακή βιβλιοθήκη επιστήμης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Biblioteca Nacional De Digital De la Ciencia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The nation's online digital library of resources for science, technology, engineering, and mathematics education and research.

NSDL holds a wide range of materials to support learning at all levels.  As a result, many users will benefit from portals with resources and services tailored to their needs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die digitale Onlinebibliothek der Nation der 
Betriebsmittel für Wissenschaft, Technologie, Technik und 
Mathematikausbildung und research.NSDL hält eine breite Strecke der 
Materialien an, um das Lernen auf allen Stufen zu unterstützen. 
Infolgedessen profitieren viele Benutzer von den Portalen mit 
Betriebsmitteln und von den Dienstleistungen, die zu ihren 
Notwendigkeiten hergestellt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La bibliothèque digitale en ligne de la nation 
des ressources pour la science, technologie, ingénierie, et 
éducation de mathématiques et research.NSDL tient un éventail de 
matériaux pour supporter l'étude à tous les niveaux. En 
conséquence, beaucoup d'utilisateurs tireront bénéfice des portails
avec des ressources et des services conçus en fonction leurs besoins.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A biblioteca digital em linha da nação dos 
recursos para a ciência, a tecnologia, a engenharia, e a instrução 
da matemática e o research.NSDL prende uma escala larga dos materiais
para suportar a aprendizagem em todos os níveis. Em 
conseqüência, muitos usuários beneficiar-se-ão dos portals com 
recursos e dos serviços costurados a suas necessidades.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La libreria digitale in linea della nazione delle 
risorse per la scienza, tecnologia, ingegneria e formazione di 
matematica e research.NSDL tiene una vasta gamma dei materiali per 
sostenere imparare a tutti i livelli. Di conseguenza, molti 
utenti trarranno beneficio dai portals con le risorse e dai servizi 
adeguati a i loro bisogni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η σε απευθείας σύνδεση ψηφιακή βιβλιοθήκη του έθνους 
των στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς για την επιστήμη, την τεχνολογία, την 
εφαρμοσμένη μηχανική, και την εκπαίδευση και την έρευνα NSDL 
μαθηματικών κρατά ένα ευρύ φάσμα των υλικών για να υποστηρίξει 
την εκμάθηση σε όλα τα επίπεδα. Κατά συνέπεια, πολλοί 
χρήστες θα ωφεληθούν από τις πύλες με τα στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς 
και τις υπηρεσίες που προσαρμόζονται στις ανάγκες τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La biblioteca digital en línea de la nación de 
los recursos para la ciencia, tecnología, ingeniería, y educación 
de las matemáticas y research.NSDL lleva a cabo una amplia gama de 
materiales para utilizar aprender en todos los niveles. 
Consecuentemente, muchos utilizadores beneficiarán de portals 
con los recursos y de servicios adaptados a sus necesidades.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087267</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106147</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/national-science-digital-library</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
